author: CNN Newsource
title: Man found dead identified as teacher accused of sexually abusing teenage girl
text:
Man found dead identified as teacher accused of sexually abusing teenage girl
By Austin Ellis
Click here for updates on this story
DUBUQUE, Iowa (
KWWL) — Dubuque Police said the man who died of an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound Wednesday was a teacher accused of a sexual relationship with a student.
Police attempted to serve an arrest warrant for 24-year-old Trent Paschal, who was a teacher at Thomas Jefferson Middle School. Paschal was alleged to have had a sexual relationship with a 14-year-old student.
Through interviews, police say they learned about inappropriate snapchats between Paschal and the victim. They also learned of two occasions where Paschal picked up the student and engaged in sex acts at his apartment.
Police said traffic cameras and surveillance footage showed Paschal picking up the student up on May 27th, going to his apartment, and leaving the apartment together.
When police attempted to serve the arrest warrant on two counts of third-degree sexual abuse on Wednesday, they heard a single gunshot from the apartment. After attempts from officers to speak with Paschal were unsuccessful, they found him dead of an apparent self-inflicted gunshot wound.
The Dubuque Community School District shared a statement with KWWL regarding the situation. The district said:
“On Friday, May 31, the Dubuque Community School District received a third-party report of an alleged inappropriate relationship between Trent Paschal and a student. Paschal was a teacher at Jefferson Middle School and Dubuque Online School, and a coach in the district. There is no indication that the alleged inappropriate contact occurred at school. The District immediately began investigating the report using its established protocols, promptly placed the staff member on administrative leave, and engaged law enforcement in the investigation. At that point, the Dubuque Police Department took the lead on the investigation, with the full cooperation of the District.
Central to our work in the Dubuque Community School District is seeking to provide a safe learning environment in which our students can thrive. These allegations were obviously concerning and taken very seriously. On June 12, 2024, the District was notified that when the Dubuque Police Department went to serve the arrest warrant in the matter on Trent Paschal, a self-inflicted gunshot occurred, and he was pronounced dead at the scene. At this time, the District will defer to and fully cooperate with the Dubuque Police Department regarding its handling of this matter.
As a District, we continue to take the allegations very seriously while also recognizing that the loss of life is always tragic.
Our focus now will be on supporting our students and staff through this difficult time, knowing that there may not be answers to many of the questions people may have.
In upcoming days, additional counseling support will be available for those wishing for additional assistance in processing these difficult events. Support will be available at Jefferson on Friday, June 14th from 10:00-11:30 AM for staff and 12:30-2:00 PM for students and families. Additional sessions will follow.”
Please note: This content carries a strict local market embargo. If you share the same market as the contributor of this article, you may not use it on any platform.

author: CNN Newssource
title: Cruise ship rescues 68 migrants drifting off Spain’s Canary Islands
text:
By CNN Newssource Published June 20, 2024 7:05 PM Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Linkedin By Sharon Braithwaite, CNN
(CNN) — A luxury cruise ship rescued 68 migrants drifting off the Spanish Canary Islands on Wednesday, Spain’s maritime rescue agency said in a statement on X.
The bulk carrier Philipp Oldendorff spotted a canoe-shaped boat adrift with people on board roughly 440 nautical miles, or about 815 km, south of Tenerife, and provided first aid to those affected while passenger ship Insignia was sent to the area, the Salvamento Maritimo statement said.
The Insignia, owned by Oceania Cruises, rescued a total of 68 people and recovered three bodies, the agency said, adding that it could not recover the remains of two people due to poor weather conditions.
On Thursday, Insignia’s crew reported that one of the rescued migrants was in critical condition and needed to be evacuated. He died before a search and rescue helicopter could reach him, the agency said.
The 62 men, three women and three minors rescued were from sub-Sahara Africa, according to the Insignia’s report to the agency.
“Safety of life at sea is of paramount importance for all seafarers,” an Oceania Cruises spokesperson told CNN via email.
“We can confirm that Insignia rescued 68 people from a vessel in distress between Cape Verde and Tenerife and bought them onboard for medical assistance and provided food, drinks, clothing and a safe place to rest. We have coordinated next steps with authorities in Tenerife, and they will be taking over the care of the rescued people,” the spokesperson added.
The 670-guest Insignia is currently sailing its 180-day Around-The-World cruise.
Data from Spain’s Interior ministry show a drastic increase of the number of migrants arriving by sea, especially to the Canary Islands.
According to Spain’s Interior ministry, between January 1 and June 15, 23,037 migrants have arrived in Spain by sea, a 122.6% increase compared to the same period last year. Of those, 18,977 have arrived to the Canary Islands by sea — an increase of 220.9% compared to the same period last year.
Earlier this month Spanish NGO Caminando Fronteras said that at least 5,000 migrants have died trying to reach Spain this year between January and May, an average of 33 people per day.

author: El Independiente
title: El tiempo de este fin de semana: frío, heladas y precipitaciones en el este peninsular
text:
El escenario más probable para este viernes y el fin de semana es que la estabilidad se vaya extendiendo a la mayor parte de España, aunque todavía habrá posibilidad de precipitaciones en puntos del oeste peninsular y del sur de Andalucía, según la predicción del portavoz de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET), Rubén del Campo.
En general predominará el tiempo anticiclónico, lo que se traducirá en heladas nocturnas en amplias zonas del interior, que en zonas de montaña serán fuertes. En las horas centrales del día el ambiente será frío, propio de esta época del año.
También habrá chubascos localmente intensos en la costa catalana, en la Comunidad Valenciana, sur de Andalucía y Baleares y nevadas en el Pirineo catalán. Mientras, en el resto del país, se registrarán cielos nubosos , aunque no se descarta alguna lluvia en el interior de las comunidades mediterráneas con nieve en sus montañas.
Las temperaturas nocturnas bajarán en el norte y en la zona centro y las heladas serán casi generalizadas en el interior de la Península. De hecho, las mínimas serán de hasta -3ºC en ciudades como Zamora, Salamanca, Segovia, Palencia, Ávila, Burgos, Pamplona o Teruel. Paralelamente, los valores diurnos subirán en el norte. De este modo, Bilbao o Santander se acercarán a los 15ºC y ciudades del sureste como Alicante, Murcia o Almería alcanzarán incluso los 17ºC.
El portavoz de AEMET ha explicado que este viernes se irá imponiendo en líneas generales el tiempo anticiclónico, aunque un área de bajas presiones dejará cielos nubosos en el oeste de la Península. Por zonas, puntos de Extremadura y de Andalucía Occidental podrían registrar lluvias débiles. En concreto, estos chubascos podrían ser algo más abundantes en el sur de Andalucía, sobre todo en el entorno del Estrecho y Alborán. A su vez, también podrá llover en el extremo norte de Cataluña, con nevadas por encima de los 1.000 metros .
Paralelamente, habrá ambiente estable en el resto con temperaturas nocturnas sin grandes cambios en el norte y en ascenso en el sur. Durante este día se darán heladas nocturnas en la mitad norte y en páramos del centro y valores diurnos que subirán en el área mediterránea y Baleares. Por ejemplo, Palma de Mallorca rondará los 18ºC. Aún así, se registrarán temperaturas que en general serán propias de la época del año.
El fin de semana Ya de cara al fin de semana, Del Campo ha avanzado que predominará el tiempo anticiclónico. Aún así, ha puntualizado que esto dará lugar a la formación de abundantes bancos de niebla y de nubes bajas que tenderán a levantar a partir de mediodía, cuando se quedarán cielos nubosos. En este sentido, sólo se esperan algunas lluvias débiles en puntos del sur de Andalucía, en torno al Sistema Central y en el Cantábrico.
En lo que respecta a las temperaturas, los valores no experimentarán en general grandes cambios, por lo que continuará el tiempo frío propio ya de mediados de diciembre. De esta manera, habrá heladas nocturnas en buena parte del interior peninsular que serán fuertes en los Pirineos y se podrá bajar hasta -3 o -4ºC en la meseta norte y paramos del centro.
En las horas centrales del día, los termómetros quedarán por debajo de 10ºC en el interior del norte, y en valores algo más altos en el Cantábrico, interior de la mitad sur y área mediterránea. Por ejemplo, en ciudades del sureste como Alicante o Almería o en la ciudad de Málaga se rondarán los 18 o 20ºC.
La semana que viene comenzará con una intensificación de las heladas, según el portavoz de AEMET. Eso sí, de cara al martes se iniciará un acusado ascenso térmico, es decir, templará el ambiente con posibles lluvias en el extremo occidental peninsular.
En lo que respecta a Canarias, Del Campo ha especificado que en los próximos días predominará el régimen de brisas con intervalos nubosos y algunos chubascos en las montañas, en las islas más montañosas. La llegada de un frente el domingo podrá dejar lluvias generalizadas más abundantes en las islas de mayor relieve. Durante las jornadas siguientes, podrán darse algunas lluvias en las islas occidentales, pero ya menos intensas.
Asimismo, las temperaturas no experimentarán grandes cambios hasta el viernes y estarán en claro ascenso durante el fin de semana, días en los que podrán superarse los 25ºC en zonas costeras.
